[requires]
libpng/1.6.37
zlib/1.2.11
freetype/2.10.2
glm/0.9.9.8
sdl/2.0.20

[generators]
gcc
cmake
txt

[options]
poco:shared=True
openssl:shared=True
freeglut:replace_glut=False
sdl:shared=True

[imports]
bin, *.* -> ../Binaries # Copies all dll files from the package "bin" folder to my project "bin" folder
lib, *.* -> ./Libs/x64  # 
include, *.* -> ./Includes #
